sentences.en: Bankers are keeping a wary eye on the outcome.
sentences.cn: 银行家们对结果保持高度警惕。

sentences.en: Billions of pounds are riding on the outcome of the election.
sentences.cn: 几十亿英镑都取决于这次选举的结果。

sentences.en: Experts say a "yes" vote is still the likely outcome.
sentences.cn: 专家说结果仍可能是投赞成票。

sentences.en: He wouldn't have accepted such an inglorious outcome.
sentences.cn: 他本来不会接受这种不光彩的结局。

sentences.en: His future as prime minister depends on the outcome of the elections.
sentences.cn: 他能否继续坐在首相的位子上取决于选举的结果。

sentences.en: It would be presumptuous to judge what the outcome will be.
sentences.cn: 现在就判断结果将会怎样未免有些冒昧。

sentences.en: Jockeys are forbidden to bet on the outcome of races.
sentences.cn: 职业赛马骑师禁止对赛马结果下注。

sentences.en: Mr. Singh said he was pleased with the outcome.
sentences.cn: 辛格先生说他对这一结果感到满意。

sentences.en: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.cn: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

sentences.en: The outcome depends on conditions as well as how events unfold.
sentences.cn: 结果取决于条件，还取决于事件的进展。

sentences.en: The outcome of the battle was indecisive.
The outcome of the court case was disappointing for the family involved.
sentences.cn: 诉讼案的结果使得涉及本案的这家人非常失望。

sentences.en: The outcome was still in doubt.
These voters often determine the outcome of statewide elections.
sentences.cn: 这些选民们往往决定着全州大选的结果。

sentences.en: We can't predict the outcome. There are too many imponderables.
sentences.cn: 我们无法预测结果，难以预料的情况太多了。

sentences.en: Whatever the outcome, it's going to be one hell of a fight.
sentences.cn: 不管结果如何，这都会是场艰苦的战斗。

trans.tran_en: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens
